title: Daily Package
description: Advanced Personal Trainer Diploma Certification is Delivered Through Blended Learning, Combining Home Study that Utilizes our award Winning E-Learning Software followed by 2 Weeks of Practical Coaching & Assessment

title: Weekly Package
description: Providers that mass produce fitness trainers on a production line, we only enrol small groups of students into our courses to ensure you receive the highest level of coaching and support.

title: Monthly Package
description: During your time with The Dangerously Fit Academy, the amount of support and coaching you'll receive will be unrivalled by any other Yerevan personal training certification.
